name: GTK Native for Thunderbird (disable Australis)
description: Makes Thunderbird conform to the system theme for the tab bar and tool bars, removing Australis look. Tabs are taken from Thunderbird 5+ GTK Tabs, which also has an option for native toolbars but it doesn't work well with recent Thunderbird.
additional_info: Tested with Thunderbird 38.4.0 on Linux, with Clearlooks theme.
